nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 155 is the 133rd issue of Star Wars Insider magazine and the sixty-third published by Titan Magazines. It was released on January 20, 2015.

As the second half of season 1 of Star Wars Rebels continues, we'll be previewing what's coming up in the show and beyond! It's a big year ahead for Star Wars fans, so we will be presenting an indispensible month-by-month guide to what's coming up, culminating in the hotly anticipated release of Star Wars: Episode VII.

We'll also be previewing Star Wars Celebration: Anaheim with a guide to getting the best out of the convention experience! Plus, an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the making of the latest epic Star Wars novel, Heir to the Jedi, and we take an exclusive look at the costumes of The Empire Strikes Back.
